name: charcoal
description: A on demand, free music streaming service

scripts.build: cd app && vite build --emptyOutDir && node copyFavicon.js
scripts.gen:fav: cd app && pwa-asset-generator ./img/charcoal.png ./favicon --background #00000000 -o false -m ./manifest.json -i ./app/index.html -t png -f true --mstile true -d true --log -c

author: imagineeeinc
